text: Kiya enhen apney say pehlay logon ki khabren nahi phonchin qom-e-nooh aur aad aur samood aur qom-e-ibrajhim aur ehal-e-madiyen aur ehal-e-motafiqaat (ulti hui bastiyon kay rehney walay) ki unn kau pass unn kay payghumbar daleel ley ker phonchay Allah aisa na tha kay unn per zulm keray bulkay unhon ney khud hi apney upper zulm kiya
